materials.description: Coal is a combustible black or brownish-black sedimentary rock used as a fuel source in industries, power generation, and metallurgy.

subcategories.name: Coking Coal
subcategories.description: Used primarily in steel production due to its high carbon content and low ash residue.

subcategories.name: Thermal Coal
subcategories.description: Mainly used for electricity generation in power plants through combustion.

subcategories.name: Pet Coke
subcategories.description: A carbon-rich solid derived from oil refining, used as a fuel and in industrial processes.

subcategories.name: Lam Coke
subcategories.description: Low-ash metallurgical coke used in the ferroalloy industry and blast furnaces.

materials.description: Mineral ores are naturally occurring solid materials from which metals or minerals can be profitably extracted.

subcategories.name: Iron Ore
subcategories.description: A key raw material in steel production, containing iron minerals like hematite and magnetite.

subcategories.name: Bauxite
subcategories.description: An ore rich in aluminum, processed to produce alumina and eventually aluminum metal.

subcategories.name: Limestone
subcategories.description: A sedimentary rock used in cement production, steel manufacturing, and soil conditioning.

subcategories.name: Gypsum
subcategories.description: A mineral used in plaster, drywall, and cement manufacturing.

materials.description: Construction materials include raw materials used in building infrastructure and structures.

subcategories.name: Clay
subcategories.description: A natural material used in ceramics, bricks, and pottery production.

subcategories.name: Clinker
subcategories.description: An intermediate product in cement manufacturing, produced by heating limestone and clay.

materials.description: Fertilizers are substances used to enhance soil fertility and promote plant growth.

subcategories.name: DAP (Diammonium Phosphate)
subcategories.description: A widely used phosphorus fertilizer that enhances root development and crop yield.

subcategories.name: Urea
subcategories.description: A nitrogen-rich fertilizer essential for plant growth and increased agricultural productivity.

subcategories.name: Rock Phosphate
subcategories.description: A natural mineral used as a source of phosphorus in organic farming.

materials.description: Other materials that do not fit into primary categories but are essential for various industries.

subcategories.name: Logs
subcategories.description: Timber logs used in construction, furniture making, and paper production.

subcategories.name: Steel Products
subcategories.description: Processed steel used in infrastructure, automobile, and machinery industries.

subcategories.name: Silica Sand
subcategories.description: A high-purity sand used in glass making, casting, and industrial applications.
